name: 1 Man 6 Bullets (YUDI GAMES)
description:
You are sure to die. Bring them with you.

1 man, 6 bullets and a herd of zombies: how long can you last?

You only have 6 bullets left in your revolver. How can you delay the inevitable, running out of ammo?

Take your ammo back.

Ricochet the bullets and get them back. Time is your ally. 

We are working on the game, stay tuned here

If you are a streamer/youtuber

The game's music is copyright free.

A pack of assets is available for you to use (Assets.zip)

Have fun :)
